Reviews.Content: the staff was very helpful as i made reservations over the phone for our first stay with family on the beach in o.c. md. we wer able to get the birthday speical witch is your age taken off the bill. although it was a couple weeks after our stay, john the mang. extended the offer the view was magnificent, we saw dolphins and pelicans. PELIGANS. we were amazed. the room was clean and had all we needed, kitchen was complete. the only thing the place could use is a mirror over the dresser in bed room and a t.v. in bed room. that would make it great, will return!!

Reviews.Title: “Nice rooms, great location, service lacking”
Reviews.Author: liesurely_traveler
Reviews.Content: The hotel was in great proximity to the beach and the view from the balcony was perfect. Also, the rooms were very clean and modern. The hotel overall was very nice. The only major issue was the lack of care or concern from the staff. Front desk was not very helpful and the maid service was absent one day, as well as very late the next. As a whole, the hotel was good, if you don't mind asking for clean towels and leaving your room as it is. I would probably stay again, but would look around at other hotels first.

Reviews.Title: “charged my credit card twice”
Reviews.Author: tripadvised-not
Reviews.Content: Charged my credit card twice for $500. When I discovered the charged on the credit card bill, I called. But the desk clerk kept giving me the runaround - "don't see the charge on our records", "the general manager is in a meeting, he will call you back as soon as he gets out", "he is out and won't be back until Thursday (it was Tuesday)", etc. He hasn't called me back yet. I have notified my credit card issuer about the double charge, and they are investigating. I am totally disappointed with this sloppiness, and possibly outright fraud. Its a sad thing to end with, because our stay was nice. The room was clean, we got fresh towels everyday. Furniture was new. Our room was ocean front, and my kids loved that.

Reviews.Title: “Never again”
Reviews.Author: charlottep41
Reviews.Content: We arrived after a 5 hour trip a little early, check in is at 3:00, we arrived at 2:00 and were told we would have to wait until 3:00 check in. Ok, that was alright, understandable. At 3:00 we were told we'd have to wait because the room was not ready. It was raining and we had a full load of children, 9, 12, 15 and two adults. We waited and waited and finally spoke with a manager who gave us a different room on the 4th floor instead of the 2nd. We finally got in the room and though the view was a bit better, the service at the front desk was just appalling with the attitude of "too bad, so sad, not my problem" with dirty look after dirty look from the young woman. Two of the dresser drawers had puddles of water in them, the balcony door was off the tracks and it took some serious muscle to open and close, not to mention the horribly loud noise of doing so. Maid service was nice although they obviously didn't want to be bothered to clean until we checked out. They did supply extra towels when asked. The elevator couldn't have been slower, even the employees complained about it. The only good thing about the place was how close it is to the beach, which was nice. It would definately benefit the place with front desk employees who at least pretended to enjoy their job and the people who travel the distance and choose, out of so many places, to stay at theirs. We will choose one of the other many hotels next time. Also, although they had a pool it was so small, and out of site, it wasn't worth it.

Reviews.Title: “So nice”
Reviews.Author: Eliezer03
Reviews.Content: This is the only place I'll stay when I come to O.C. The rooms are clean and the beds comfortable. The central location is ideal, and if you can get it, the view from the ocean side 5th floor is all a person can ask for. The staff is exceptionally accommodating, and friendly. If your looking for a clean and comfortable stay at the beach this is your place.

Reviews.Title: “Very disappointed! Will not go back.”
Reviews.Author: chazyisme
Reviews.Content: We were very disappointed with our stay at this hotel. We reserved an oceanview room about a week and a half before our trip, and when we got there they didn't have any rooms clean. So after waiting for a while, they had a first floor room available. We walked in, looked out the balcony and only saw a parking lot, we went back and requested a room change to actually see the ocean. After waiting a while again, they put us on the 2nd floor. When we tried to connect to the internet, we couldn't--ot in our room, on the balcony or in the hallway. A member of their staff said there is no way to get internet access through the concrete walls on the 2nd of 4th floor. Yet their website says free wireless internet in all rooms. This was a rip off and false advertising. The ice machine did not work during our stay either (we stayed sunday night-thursday night). The hot water tank also broke and was not fixed for the greater part of a day, and none of the guests were informed. We also did not have sheets or blankets for the pull out couch, and had to request some. The maid service was very slow and did not do a good job. Our bathroom had long black hair everywhere, none of us have long OR black hair so we knew it wasn't ours. We ran out of washcloths and were told there are no more; they gave us hand towels instead. Also ran out of tissues and t.p. and had to ask for those as well. The manager, John, kept pushing things off saying it wasn't his fault or he can't help that things happened the way they did. He would not give us any discounts or anything else, except a late check out. Other than that, the view was good, the beach was only a few steps away, the pool was alright, and the convenient hose outside to wash off sand was wonderful. We will not be staying at this hotel again though. Hope you do not either.

Reviews.Title: “Awesome!”
Reviews.Author: ptg1412
Reviews.Content: My boyfriend and I stayed at the Atlantic Oceanfront Inn July 13-16th, 2009. We had an oceanfront room and it was awesome! The room was beautiful and it had a great view of the ocean. The room had a small kitchen two queen beds a sofa bed, a coffee table, and a little table to eat on. The service was great as well, we would go out for breakfast and by the time we came back our room was already clean. Although it is about 19 blocks from the boardwalk it was right on the beach, we acutally didnt mind it being far from the boardwalk because we were able to enjoy the beach without the huge crowd that comes from the boardwalk, and we drove to it at night anyways. We will definetly be staying at this hotel again next summer!

Reviews.Title: “Incredible value, beautiful ocean views, elegant contemporary design.”
Reviews.Author: JBW6123
Reviews.Content: Without a doubt, my stay at the Atlantic Oceanfront Inn was by far the best value for the price in Ocean City. We enjoyed a comfortable stay, even in the heat, thanks to multiple independent air conditioning units throughout the suite. Hotel staff were very courteous, and made sure that our stay was pleasant. The hotel is just a short walk from Seacrets, one of the best night life experiences on the East Coast, and mere steps from the beach. I highly recommend this hotel, and having already stayed there twice this summer, look forward to going back again.

Reviews.Title: “Dirty”
Reviews.Author: SunnyNJTraveler
Reviews.Content: My family and I stayed at this "hotel" the week after July 4th. The only good thing about the hotel is the location to the beach. The hotel itself is filthy. It has the worst set up for rooms I have ever seen. We booked a hotel suite, yet we were very decieved. The suite turned out to be two rooms. The first was a bedroom that you walked into right when you opened the door, thus you could only exit and enter by walking through someone's bedroom. Secondly, the kitchen, another bed, and living room where all in the same room which lead the balcony; this is very inconvienant seeing as how the only way to enter and exit the room was through walking through someone else's sleeping area. My brother was going to sleep on the pull out couch, yet we didn't go to bed until around 12. It was then that I realized there were no blankets or sheets so I called the front desk. I asked if they had any blankets to which the woman replied "no". I asked her how could they not have any blankets or sheets, to which she replied "I'm the only one here, you need to give me a minute" and hung up. I called back and said don't worry about, as long as they had them in the morning that would be okay I didn't want to be a pain. The woman told me "No, I'm coming up". I waited in the hallway to get them, since I didn't want anyone knocking and waking up my parents. The woman basically threw the linens at me and walked away. We also had an incidence where we had the door not disturb sign on the door and a man walked into the room while my mother and sister were sitting on the balcony. Also, the hotel claimed to have free Wi-Fi, yet my brother could never access the internet. The price we payed for this hotel suite was definitely not worth it. It was nothing like a suite, the place was filthy, and the staff questionable. Again, the only good thing about the hotel is the location to the beach.

Reviews.Title: “would not stay again”
Reviews.Author: Corri34
Reviews.Content: We stayed at this hotel recently and were disappointed. The pool is very small. The ice machine wasn't working, and we had to carry all our luggage up and back because the hotel only has one luggage cart for the entire place. We didn't get the floor requested. The price charged doesn't match the accommodations. I have stayed for years at other places for way cheaper and much better service. We stayed only to try something different and the ocean view. The view was really nice, however, I would not return to this place just for the view.

Reviews.Title: “Hotel was Ok”
Reviews.Author: devdrew
Reviews.Content: Arrived on Monday and was told that the ice machine was broken and would be fixed that afternoon. We left on Thursday and it still wasn't fixed. Room was nice and clean. Beds were comfortable. Bathroom was small. Room we were given was ocean view, but we were on the first floor and the only view we had was of the sand dune in front of the hotel. Would have been nice to be higher up to actually see the ocean. Pool was very small, but seems like all hotel pools are small in OC. Location was great-right by the beach. Also was told that WiFi available but weren't able to connect the entire time we were there.

Reviews.Title: “Everyone Deserves a Second Chance!”
Reviews.Author: prolan74
Reviews.Content: And I am sure glad I gave Atlantic Oceanfront Inn one. For years I have been going back to this hotel and had one bad experience after another. What took the cake was in 2006; we vacationed at OC and stayed here with 3 adults and 2 children. When we pulled the sofa bed out, there was just a frame; no mattress, nothing. We called the front desk and they had the "too bad, so sad" attitude. I did not go back for several years due to the bad service. UNTIL last month I read on Trip Advisor that the hotel was under new management and had made some great improvements. So, with that in mind, I booked my stay for a week in an ocean front room. I was delighted to walk in to a newly remodeled, fresh and clean room. The service was excellent, housekeeping was great! We would go down to the beach in the morning and housekeeping would have our room refreshed by the time we came back for lunch. If you are planning to stay at this hotel, bear in mind that the kitchens are stocked with basic cooking and eating utensils. You will need to bring a few extra things of your own, such as a cork screw (if you are a wine connoisseurs), small baking sheet, or pizza pan, colander, and a sharp knife. Also, keep in mind that, like all beach hotels, younger crowds are all around. Be prepared for a little noise from neighbors, especially on the weekends. We were there the week of June 22-26, right after senior week, and before the 4th of July crowd and it was not loud at all. I am very glad I gave this hotel a second chance! I love the convenience of everything nearby and told the gentleman during check out that I would see them all again next year!

Reviews.Title: “I'm very pleased with my stay at the Atlantic Oceanfront Inn.”
Reviews.Author: mjp3166
Reviews.Content: My stay at the Atlantic Oceanfront Inn was excellent. The staff strived to meet all of my needs in a timely, hospitable manner.

Reviews.Title: “Great Value, Great View, Great Staff, Great Stay!!!”
Reviews.Author: krhoy20
Reviews.Content: Boyfriend and I headed to OC w/o reservations, hoping we could find something once we arrived. After checking out a few other places, we choose Atlantic Oceanfront Inn for the friendly staff and the value. The staff made sure we were comfortable and had everything we needed!!! The view was spectacular!!!! Enjoyed the evening on the balcony watching the waves crash! The room was recently renovated(up tp date). We only stayed one night so didnt really use the kitchen but would be nice for a longer stay. The King bed was one of the most comfy hotel beds ever. I felt like the room was clean and didnt have to ask for anything!!! Would stay again.

Reviews.Title: “Great location”
Reviews.Author: edgg
Reviews.Content: All of the service was great, Newly remodeled nicely done Beautiful beach hope to go back again

Reviews.Title: “Living in the lap of luxury at a low price!”
Reviews.Author: swr9152
Reviews.Content: Location is very accessible and right in middle of where you want to be in town. When we pulled up to the Atlantic that is oceanfront we were warmly received by their front desk. Within moments we were in our beautiful room overlooking the ocean. The manager during most of our stay was John who is very helpful and will go out of his way to make sure your happy and enjoying yourself. The front desk and maid staff are also extremely kind and will go out of their way to make sure your content. Overall very pleasant experience and recommend the Atlantic Oceanfront Inn to anyone.

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel, great view!”
Reviews.Author: amc0547
Reviews.Content: Fantastic stay from beginning to end….friendly staff, clean rooms, and a view that can’t be beat!

Reviews.Title: “very bad hotel experience”
Reviews.Author: gingergoldie
Reviews.Content: When I first walked into the lobby, it was a mess, unattractive, and the desk attendant was rude. next getting items into the hotel was extremely rough and the room was dirty. I had to ask for a vacume cleaner 2 days into our stay and vacume the room myself. the clean towels were rough. thats the only thing we got was clean (rough) towels everyday. No hair dryer or iron in the rooms. dishes and refrigerater was dirty. NEVER again will I stay at this place and would like to get a refund back for the horrible shock and experience we had staying at this hotel. VERY DIRTY.

Reviews.Title: “The worst hotel experience BY FAR”
Reviews.Author: Malarky1026
Reviews.Content: Me and a couple of my girlfriends went to OC Labor Day Weekend just for 2 days/1 night as ,what was hoped to be, a fun last mini-vacation of the summer. We stayed at the Atlantic Oceanfront Inn and it was by far the worst hotel experience I have ever had in my life. First off, the staff was incredibly rude and unprofessional.. I cannot even stress that enough. The hotel was absolutely filthy... some lightbulbs worked, some didn't, one cheap plastic chair on the balcony, the door handle was broken and had to be opened only a certain way, the bathrooms disgusting, beds hard as a rock, etc etc. When first entering the hotel we noticed that the toilet had been stomped up. With absolute disgust, we immediately called the front desk to ask to have that fixed. We waited and waited for someone until we finally had to call again in which they explained that they had already come to our room and no one answered, which was a complete lie. They continued to argue with us saying that we had to go down to THEM and they would give us a plunger!! I was absolutely appalled and complained that I would absolutely not plunge a toilet that we found like that when we entered our room. They continued to argue saying that the maintainence worker was off and no one was there to do it so we had to and "if [we] didn't like it [we] can complain to the manager in the morning". After a couple minutes she finally said ok she'll have someone come up. When they knocked on the door, they handed us the plunger and walked away. Absolutely rude and disgusting if you ask me. So after this occurrence and all of us frustrated as it is, we noticed that the bathroom had absolutely no towel, floor mats, wash clothes, etc. What hotel does that? Again, we called the front desk to ask if they could bring us towels. They replied that if we wanted towels WE had to go get them ourselves downstairs. Are you kidding? Again implying that "if [we] didn't like it [we] can complain to the manager in the morning". When the towels were retrieved from the front desk they had only given us 2 so we explained we would be needing more and they refused to give us any more than 2 towels. Not to mention, the staff was just sitting there playing Solitaire on the computer. We were absolutely beyond furious at this point! Later on, we realized we needed more pillows. Again, called the front desk to ask if we could get more pillows. They flat out said that we could absolutely not get any more pillows. Not to mention, we were again told "if [we] didn't like it [we] can complain to the manager in the morning". We were stuck using the pillows from the couches! The flat pillows and the rock hard beds with one itchy thin comforter caused the most horrible nights sleep, as you can imagine. I couldn't stress to you more what a horrible hotel this is, regardless of the decent prices and ok view. Having to deal with the incredibly rude staff and the dirty rooms is definitely not worth it. Please, please, please do not waste your time or money.

Reviews.Title: “horrible! never again!!”
Reviews.Author: vacationlover45
Reviews.Content: this hotel was beyong horrible! me my husband and my two children one 15 and one 12 walked in and it was a mess. the toilet was broken not even attatched to the ground. there was no toilet paper only two towels. the couch smelled like throw up. the chair by the table was broken and the carpet tacks were sticking out of the ground. there was a pretty nice view but that was about it, the beds were not confortable and the chairs on the balcany were plastic chairs. the staff were very rude and they didnt vaccume or clean our room. they didnt take all the dirty towels off the floor in the bathroom and they were just beyond rude. we will NEVER stay there again and i reccomend that no one stays in this hotel.
